info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the resource. It can be up to 64 characters long.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: The URL we should call using `inbound_method` when a message is received by any phone number or short code in the Service. When this property is `null`, receiving inbound messages is disabled.
parameters.name: InboundRequestUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method we should use to call `inbound_request_url`. Can be `GET` or `POST` and the default is `POST`.
parameters.name: InboundMethod

parameters.description: The URL that we should call using `fallback_method` if an error occurs while retrieving or executing the TwiML from the Inbound Request URL.
parameters.name: FallbackUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method we should use to call `fallback_url`. Can be: `GET` or `POST`.
parameters.name: FallbackMethod

parameters.description: The URL we should call to [pass status updates](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/api/message-resource#message-status-values) about message delivery.
parameters.name: StatusCallback

parameters.description: Whether to enable [Sticky Sender](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services#sticky-sender) on the Service instance.
parameters.name: StickySender

parameters.description: Whether to enable the [MMS Converter](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services#mms-converter) for messages sent through the Service instance.
parameters.name: MmsConverter

parameters.description: Whether to enable [Smart Encoding](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services#smart-encoding) for messages sent through the Service instance.
parameters.name: SmartEncoding

parameters.description: Reserved.
parameters.name: ScanMessageContent

parameters.description: Whether to enable [Fallback to Long Code](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services#fallback-to-long-code) for messages sent through the Service instance.
parameters.name: FallbackToLongCode

parameters.description: Whether to enable [Area Code Geomatch](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services#area-code-geomatch) on the Service Instance.
parameters.name: AreaCodeGeomatch

parameters.description: How long, in seconds, messages sent from the Service are valid. Can be an integer from `1` to `14,400`.
parameters.name: ValidityPeriod

parameters.description: Reserved.
parameters.name: SynchronousValidation

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to read the resources from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to create the resource under.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Alphanumeric Sender ID string. Can be up to 11 characters long. Valid characters are A-Z, a-z, 0-9, space, and hyphen `-`. This value cannot contain only numbers.
parameters.name: AlphaSender

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to delete the resource from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the AlphaSender resource to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to fetch the resource from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the AlphaSender resource to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to read the resources from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to create the resource under.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Phone Number being added to the Service.
parameters.name: PhoneNumberSid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to delete the resource from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the PhoneNumber resource to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to fetch the resource from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to read the resources from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to create the resource under.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the ShortCode resource being added to the Service.
parameters.name: ShortCodeSid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to delete the resource from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the ShortCode resource to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to fetch the resource from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the ShortCode resource to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Service resource to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Service resource to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Service resource to update.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the resource. It can be up to 64 characters long.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: The URL we should call using `inbound_method` when a message is received by any phone number or short code in the Service. When this property is `null`, receiving inbound messages is disabled.
parameters.name: InboundRequestUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method we should use to call `inbound_request_url`. Can be `GET` or `POST` and the default is `POST`.
parameters.name: InboundMethod

parameters.description: The URL that we should call using `fallback_method` if an error occurs while retrieving or executing the TwiML from the Inbound Request URL.
parameters.name: FallbackUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method we should use to call `fallback_url`. Can be: `GET` or `POST`.
parameters.name: FallbackMethod

parameters.description: The URL we should call to [pass status updates](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/api/message-resource#message-status-values) about message delivery.
parameters.name: StatusCallback

parameters.description: Whether to enable [Sticky Sender](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services#sticky-sender) on the Service instance.
parameters.name: StickySender

parameters.description: Whether to enable the [MMS Converter](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services#mms-converter) for messages sent through the Service instance.
parameters.name: MmsConverter

parameters.description: Whether to enable [Smart Encoding](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services#smart-encoding) for messages sent through the Service instance.
parameters.name: SmartEncoding

parameters.description: Reserved.
parameters.name: ScanMessageContent

parameters.description: Whether to enable [Fallback to Long Code](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services#fallback-to-long-code) for messages sent through the Service instance.
parameters.name: FallbackToLongCode

parameters.description: Whether to enable [Area Code Geomatch](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services#area-code-geomatch) on the Service Instance.
parameters.name: AreaCodeGeomatch

parameters.description: How long, in seconds, messages sent from the Service are valid. Can be an integer from `1` to `14,400`.
parameters.name: ValidityPeriod

parameters.description: Reserved.
parameters.name: SynchronousValidation

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the [Messaging Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services/api) the session belongs to.
parameters.name: MessagingServiceSid

parameters.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the resource. It can be up to 64 characters long.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: A JSON string that stores application-specific data.
parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.description: The date, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format, to assign to the resource as the date it was created.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format, to assign to the resource as the date it was last updated.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: The Identity of the session's creator. If the Session was created through the API, the value will be `system`
parameters.name: CreatedBy

parameters.description: The HTTP method to use when sending a webhook request.
parameters.name: WebhookMethod

parameters.description: The list of webhook event triggers that are enabled for the Service.
parameters.name: WebhookFilters

parameters.description: The absolute URL of the pre-event webhook.
parameters.name: PreWebhookUrl

parameters.description: The absolute URL of the post-event webhook.
parameters.name: PostWebhookUrl

parameters.description: The number of times to try the pre-event webhook request if the first attempt fails. Can be up to 3 and the default is 0.
parameters.name: PreWebhookRetryCount

parameters.description: The number of times to try the post-event webhook request if the first attempt fails. Can be up to 3 and the default is 0.
parameters.name: PostWebhookRetryCount

parameters.description: The routing target of the webhook. Can be ordinary or routed internally to Flex
parameters.name: Target

parameters.description: The SID of the Session with the messages to read.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the Session for the message.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The [identity](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/identity) of the message's author. Defaults to `system`.
parameters.name: Author

parameters.description: A JSON string that stores application-specific data.
parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.description: The date, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format, to assign to the resource as the date it was created.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format, to assign to the resource as the date it was last updated.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: The message body.
parameters.name: Body

parameters.description: The SID of the Session with the message to delete.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The SID of the SessionMessage resource to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Session with the message to fetch.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The SID of the SessionMessage resource to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Session with the message to update.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The SID of the SessionMessage resource to update.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The [identity](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/identity) of the message's author. Defaults to `system`.
parameters.name: Author

parameters.description: A JSON string that stores application-specific data.
parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.description: The date, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format, to assign to the resource as the date it was created.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format, to assign to the resource as the date it was last updated.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: The message body.
parameters.name: Body

parameters.description: The SID of the Session with the participants to read.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the Session for the participant.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: A JSON string that stores application-specific data.
parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.description: The address of the Twilio phone number, WhatsApp number, or Messenger Page ID that the participant is in contact with. This field, together with user_address, is only null when the participant is interacting from a Chat endpoint (see the 'identity' field).
parameters.name: TwilioAddress

parameters.description: The date, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format, to assign to the resource as the date it was created. This is used when importing messages from another system, as the provided value will be trusted and displayed on SDK clients.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format, to assign to the resource as the date it was last updated. This is used when importing messages from another system, as the provided value will be trusted and displayed on SDK clients.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: The application-defined string that uniquely identifies the [Chat User](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/user-resource) as the session participant. This parameter is null unless the participant is using the Programmable Chat SDK to communicate.
parameters.name: Identity

parameters.description: The address of the participant's device. Can be a phone number or Messenger ID. Together with the Twilio Address, this determines a participant uniquely. This field (with twilio_address) is null when the participant is interacting from a Chat endpoint (see the `identity` field).
parameters.name: UserAddress

parameters.description: The SID of the Session with the participant to delete.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The SID of the SessionParticipant resource to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Session with the participant to fetch.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The SID of the SessionParticipant resource to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Session with the participant to update.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The SID of the SessionParticipant resource to update.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: A JSON string that stores application-specific data.
parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.description: The date, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format, to assign to the resource as the date it was created. This is used when importing messages from another system, as the provided value will be trusted and displayed on SDK clients.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format, to assign to the resource as the date it was last updated.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: The SID of the Session with the Webhook resources to read.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the Session for the webhook.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The target of the webhook.
parameters.name: Target

parameters.description: The absolute URL the webhook request should be sent to.
parameters.name: Configuration.Url

parameters.description: The HTTP method we should use when sending a webhook request to `url`. Can be `POST` or `GET`.
parameters.name: Configuration.Method

parameters.description: The list of events that trigger a webhook event for the Session.
parameters.name: Configuration.Filters

parameters.description: The list of keywords, firing webhook event for the Session.
parameters.name: Configuration.Triggers

parameters.description: The SID of the studio flow where the webhook should be sent to.
parameters.name: Configuration.FlowSid

parameters.description: The number of times to call the webhook request if the first attempt fails. Can be up to 3 and the default is 0.
parameters.name: Configuration.RetryCount

parameters.description: The message index for which and its successors the webhook will be replayed. Not set by default.
parameters.name: Configuration.ReplayAfter

parameters.description: Whether buffering should be applied to messages. Not set by default.
parameters.name: Configuration.BufferMessages

parameters.description: The period to buffer messages in milliseconds. Default is 3,000 ms.
parameters.name: Configuration.BufferWindow

parameters.description: The SID of the Session with the Webhook resource to delete.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The SID of the SessionScopedWebhook resource to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Session with the Webhook resource to fetch.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.name: Sid

parameters.name: Sid

parameters.name: Configuration.Url

parameters.name: Configuration.Filters

parameters.name: Configuration.Triggers

parameters.description: The SID of the studio flow where the webhook should be sent to.
parameters.name: Configuration.FlowSid

parameters.description: The number of times to try the webhook request if the first attempt fails. Can be up to 3 and the default is 0.
parameters.name: Configuration.RetryCount

parameters.description: Whether buffering should be applied to messages. Not set by default.
parameters.name: Configuration.BufferMessages

parameters.description: The period to buffer messages in milliseconds. Default is 3,000 ms.
parameters.name: Configuration.BufferWindow

parameters.name: Sid

parameters.name: Sid

parameters.name: Sid

parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.description: The date, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format, to assign to the resource as the date it was created.
parameters.name: DateCreated
